00911     class SynchronizationError :public ReactorException {
00912     public:
00918       SynchronizationError(TeleoReactor const &r, std::string const &msg) throw()
00919        :ReactorException(r, msg) {}
00921       ~SynchronizationError() throw() {}
00922     }; // TREX::transaction::SynchronizationError
00923               
00932     class DispatchError :public ReactorException {
00933     public:
00939       DispatchError(TeleoReactor const &r, goal_id const &g, std::string const &msg) throw()
00940        :ReactorException(r, buil_msg(g, msg)) {}
00942       ~DispatchError() throw() {}
00943       
00944     private:
00945       static std::string buil_msg(goal_id const &g, std::string const &msg) throw();
00946     };
